pages.text: With a Manometer you can measure $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ on a pneumatic network. Additionally, some Pneumatic machines/tubes have some special information about them. For instance, the $(l:tubes/safety_module)Safety Valve Tube Module/$ displays its safety threshold. So if you aren't feeling comfortable with redstone maths, this tool may be of use to you.

pages.title: Other Mods
pages.text: With mods such as $(thing)The One Probe/$ or $(thing)WAILA/HWYLA/$ installed, the $(item)Manometer/$ may be of limited use.
